description:
Warm feet are happy feet. These full length insole warmers keep your feet toasty from heel-to-toe. No fumes, no flames and no batteries required.

  • Sold in pairs
  • S/M fit men’s 4-7 and women’s 5-8. M/L fit men’s 8+ and women’s 9+
  • Activated by contact with the air (oxidization). Process can be paused by putting the toe warmer in any airtight container – but it needs to be used within a few days
  • Slim design won’t change the fit of your footwear
  • Each insole provides more than 5 hours of heat
  • Adhesive base keeps insole from shifting or moving under foot
  • Made from natural ingredients, meaning you can easily dispose of them in any regular garbage
  • Ingredients include: iron powder, water, salt, activated charcoal and vermiculite
  • Note – do not trim the insole
name: Grabber Foot Insole Warmers
